pircing.title: Mrs. Steel - Piercing Specialist
pircing.intro: Experience professional piercing artistry with the highest safety and hygiene standards.

about.title: About Mrs. Steel
about.description: Selina is the piercing specialist at Mr. Ink Tattoo. With years of experience, she places the highest priority on safety and individual consultation to ensure every client feels comfortable and in the best hands.
about.description2: With extensive knowledge in piercing techniques and hygiene, Mrs. Steel provides expert advice on all piercing requests. From classic ear piercings to body piercings – quality and safety come first.

services.title: Our Piercing Services
services.earDesc: Lobe, Helix, Tragus, Daith and more

standards.sterileDesc: Strict hygiene protocols for your safety

pircing.portfolioDesc: Here you can see various works by Mrs. Steel in different piercing styles.

gallery.title: Portfolio
gallery.subtitle: Explore our latest tattoo creations
gallery.portfolioDesc: Dive into our collection of unique tattoos. Each artwork tells a story and showcases our artists' mastery.

team.title: Our Team
team.subtitle: Meet the talented artists behind Mr. Ink Tattoo
team.maxBio: Max is the owner of Mr. Ink Tattoo in Nürtingen. With his feel for current trends and an eye for aesthetics, he creates individual tattoos – whether classic motifs or modern styles. His precision and passion for custom artwork define his work. Outside the studio, Max is a family man.
team.selinaBio: Selina is the piercing specialist at Mr. Ink Tattoo. With years of experience and extensive knowledge in hygiene and piercing techniques, she places the highest priority on safety and individual consultation. From classic ear piercings to body piercings – Selina ensures every client feels comfortable and in the best hands. Her precise work and strict adherence to the highest hygiene standards make every visit a safe experience.
team.guestArtists: Additionally, guest tattoo artists work in the studio, renting chairs to realize their own projects. This allows our clients to benefit from various styles and techniques under one roof.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: Ready to start your tattoo journey? Get in touch today!

imprint.title: Imprint
imprint.responsibleText: Max Riss is responsible for all content on this website according to § 18 Abs. 2 MStV (German Interstate Media Treaty) and § 5 TMG (German Telemedia Act).
imprint.liabilityContentText: As a service provider, we are responsible for our own content on these pages according to § 7 Abs. 1 TMG (German Telemedia Act). The content of our pages has been created with the utmost care. However, we cannot guarantee the content's accuracy, completeness, or topicality.
imprint.liabilityLinksText: Our website contains links to external third-party websites over whose content we have no control. Therefore, we cannot assume any liability for this external content. According to §§ 8 to 10 TMG, we are not obligated to monitor transmitted or stored third-party information.
imprint.copyrightText: The content and works on these pages created by the site operators are subject to German copyright law. Duplication, processing, distribution, and any form of commercialization of such material beyond the scope of copyright law shall require the prior written consent of its respective author or creator.
imprint.hygieneCertText: Updated annually according to § 6 TätMV (German Tattoo Ink Regulation)

privacy.title: Data Protection Policy
privacy.overviewText: The following information provides an overview of what happens to your personal data when you visit our website. Personal data is any data that can be used to personally identify you. This privacy policy complies with the EU General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) and the German Federal Data Protection Act (BDSG).
privacy.controllerText: The party responsible for data processing on this website is:
privacy.contactFormsText: When you submit our contact form, we collect your information from the inquiry form including the contact details you provide for the purpose of processing your request and for potential follow-up questions. This data will not be shared without your consent.
privacy.cookiesText: Our website uses cookies to improve user experience. You can configure your browser to refuse cookies or to alert you when cookies are being sent.
privacy.rightsText: You have the right to information, correction, deletion, restriction of processing, data portability, and to object to the processing of your personal data.
privacy.rightInfoText: You have the right to request confirmation as to whether we are processing personal data concerning you.
privacy.rightCorrectionText: You have the right to request the immediate correction of inaccurate personal data concerning you.
privacy.rightDeletionText: You have the right to request that we immediately delete personal data concerning you.
privacy.rightRestrictionText: You have the right to request the restriction of the processing of your personal data.
privacy.rightPortabilityText: You have the right to receive the personal data concerning you in a structured, commonly used, and machine-readable format.
privacy.rightObjectionText: You have the right to object at any time to the processing of personal data concerning you for reasons arising from your particular situation.
privacy.contactText: If you have any questions about this privacy policy, please contact us at mr.ink.nt@gmail.com.
privacy.dataStorageText: Your data will only be stored for as long as necessary for the respective purpose or as required by legal retention periods.

galleryInfo.title: Our Portfolio
galleryInfo.description: Each piece in our gallery represents hours of careful planning, artistic skill, and collaborative work with our clients. From small, delicate designs to large, complex compositions, we pride ourselves on delivering exceptional quality and bringing our clients' visions to life.
